abstract: Investigators are looking into 14 episodes of cheating dating back to 2002 that involved New York City educators who took risks or flouted rules.
snippet: Investigators’ reports offer a look into 14 episodes involving New York City educators.
lead_paragraph: Investigators’ reports offer a look into 14 episodes involving New York City educators.

headline.main: In Cheating Cases, Teachers Who Took Risks or Flouted Rules
headline.print_headline: In Cheating Cases, Teachers Who Took Risks or Flouted Rules
headline.seo: How Cheating Cases by Educators at New York Schools Played Out
